Package it.polimi.ingsw.PSP14.client.controller

Class ClientMatch

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.PSP14.client.controller.ClientMatch
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.lang.Runnable
public class ClientMatch
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Runnable
This class handles the basic logic behind a match on the client, processing commands received from the server, and sending back responses to it.

      public ClientMatch​(ServerConnection serverConnection, UI ui)
      Constructor for ClientMatch.
      Parameters:
      serverConnection - a connection to send and receive messages.
      ui - a UI to represent the game state

  • Method Details

    • run

      public void run()
      Run main method of the ClientMatch class. Recieves messages from the server and executes them in an infinite loop. Exits if an IOException is caught (meaning a connection error has occurred).
      Specified by:
      run in interface java.lang.Runnable
